task_description: Generate additional PSYC100 quiz questions for weeks 6, 7, 8, and 9

phases.name: Question Generation
phases.description: Generate psychology quiz questions for all 4 weeks in parallel
success_criteria: Questions cover all major topics from slides
Mix of learning, application, and tricky difficulty levels
Each question has 4 options with comprehensive explanations
Questions test conceptual understanding not just memorization

phases.name: Final Testing
phases.description: Comprehensive testing of all implemented features. This phase uses chrome-devtools MCP for browser testing, curl for API tests, and runs any existing test suites.
deliverables: All UI features tested via browser automation
All API endpoints tested via curl/integration tests
No critical bugs or regressions found
success_criteria: API responses are correct and performant
Application and tricky questions that test understanding
